# Dr. Xiaojun Zhu

I am an Associate Professor at Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University. I was awarded the Ph.D. in Mathematics (Statistics) at McMaster University, and joined the Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University from 2017.

### Experience

-   Associate Professor, Department of Financial and Actuarial Mathematics, 2022-present
-   Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematical Sciences, 2017-2022
-   Statistician, Office of Institutional Research and Analysis, McMaster University, Canada, 2015-2017

### Research Interests

-   Complex Data Analysis
-   BioStatistics
-   Reliability
-   Distribution Theory
